name: Nutrition
description: As a part of the San Francisco Health Network (SFHN), the Maxine Hall Health Center provides anyone in need with the following nutrition services: - Nutrition education - Chronic condition diet recommendations - Healthy lifestyle changes
fullDescription: As a part of the San Francisco Health Network (SFHN), the Maxine Hall Health Center provides anyone in need with the following nutrition services: - Nutrition education - Chronic condition diet recommendations - Healthy lifestyle changes
whatTheyOffer: As a part of the San Francisco Health Network (SFHN), the Maxine Hall Health Center provides anyone in need with the following nutrition services: - Nutrition education - Chronic condition diet recommendations - Healthy lifestyle changes
howToGetIt: Call 628-206-7800 to schedule a telephone appointment with a Certified Enrollment Worker.
cost: Accepted health insurances include: Medi-Cal and Healthy San Francisco
